Manav Rachna University

Manav Rachna University is a private university[1] located in Faridabad, Haryana, India. It was established as Manav Rachna College of Engineering (MRCE) in 2004 and became a university in 2014.[2]

Cyber Squad

Within the walls of MRU, a dynamic force is at work, dedicated to fortifying the digital realm against ever-evolving threats. Welcome to CyberSquad, the vanguard of cybersecurity excellence within our college community. CyberSquad, a name synonymous with resilience and innovation, embodies the ethos of MRU: forward-thinking, collaborative, and unwavering in its pursuit of excellence. Comprising a diverse cohort of students, CyberSquad brings together individuals from various disciplines, united by their passion for cybersecurity. What sets CyberSquad apart is not just its members' individual talents, but their collective strength as a team. Through regular meetings, workshops, and hands-on projects, CyberSquad members sharpen their skills while fostering a culture of collaboration and mutual support. Together, they confront simulated cyber threats, devise ingenious solutions, and push the boundaries of what's possible in the realm of cybersecurity. But CyberSquad's impact extends beyond the confines of our college campus. With a commitment to community engagement and outreach, CyberSquad organizes cybersecurity awareness campaigns, partners with industry leaders, and shares its expertise to empower individuals and organizations to navigate the digital landscape safely and securely.

Objectives

  • Education and Awareness
  • Skill Development
  • Industry Collaboration
  • Networking
